text: hi
Hi.
how are you?
Fine. I would like to discuss Saint Judes Hospital for Children with you. Is this a charity that you know of?
sorry i dont know
It is and awesome charity. They assist families with children that have terminal illnesses.
wow! really/
Yes! It gets better. At St Jude's everything is free. They pay for a place for the parents to stay close to the child and all care is free.
woww!. which place?
I don't think its a particular place just wherever the parents want to stay so they can be close to their child. Have you ever donated to a charity?
yes. i am donate but one year back?
May I ask which charity and why you chose that charity?
i am telling children's charity
Good. A children's charity is the best choice. Would you donate again to that same charity?
yes sir, sure.
How much would you be willing to donate?
i am donate $100 donate
Would you donate this same amount to St Jude's based on the information I have given you?
oh! sure sir.
Great. Do you have access to internet so you can go to their site and donate to them?
